name: Latig0sx
body:
### Usage

**1) Check your System Configuration**

    $ sudo ./latigo-check -u <user>

**2) System Hardening**

    $ sudo ./latigo-hardening -u <user>

### Download

[latig0sx-0.3.tar.gz](https://github.com/downloads/lain77z/latig0sx/latig0sx-0.3.tar.gz) 

### Features

    Check System Hardware
    Check Global System Settings
    Check System Preferences
    Check Accounts
    Check Network Services
    System Hardening

### Screenshots

![Check](http://imageshack.us/a/img856/466/latigocheck.png)
![Hardening](http://imageshack.us/a/img856/8595/latigohardening.png)

Compliance with the common NSA criteria
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
